Another Microsoft veteran, Amitabh Srivastava joined the company in 1997. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career, Steve Ballmer said.

ring MUNCIE, Ind.-- U.S. Rep. Mike Pence discussed his political future-- in somewhat nonspecific terms-- while addressing students in a Central High School social studies class Friday. Mike Pence acknowledged he was considering maybe coming home and running for governor, but the Republican said he was likely months away from making a final decision. He didn't completely rule out seeking a seventh term representing Indiana's 6th District in the U.S. House. While
